feed.title: Track Awesome European Tech Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: An up-to-date, community-driven list of awesome European tech alternatives! All focused on privacy, sustainability, and innovation. The goal is to support European projects and companies compliant with GDPR, UK GDPR, and the Swiss FADP.

entry.title: Awesome European Tech Updates on Jul 04, 2025
entry.content:
Index / DNS

  • Nanelo 🇩🇪 - Operates a European cluster of DNS nameservers.

  • MAGMASOFT 🇩🇪 - Casting design and simulation
  • Scilab 🇫🇷 - Open source software for numerical computation
  • Tecnomatix Plant Simulation 🇩🇪 - Modelling, simulating and visualizing of production systems

entry.title: Awesome European Tech Updates on Feb 17, 2025

Index / Crowdfunding Platforms

  • Boomerang 🇩🇰 - Reward, investment and loan-based crowdfunding platform, 100% Danish-owned.
  • Ulule 🇫🇷 - Crowdfunding, certified training courses and a store of sustainable brands, to help develop creative, sustainable projects.
  • betterplace.org 🇩🇪 - Germany's largest donation platform: non-profit and non-profit-oriented.
  • Give&Fund 🇬🇷 - Easy-to-use and safe crowdfunding platform that offers you a better way to raise money online.
  • RaiseNow 🇨🇭 - Powerful donation platform for nonprofits of all sizes.

entry.title: Awesome European Tech Updates on Feb 09, 2025
entry.content:
Acceptance Criteria

  • Compliance: Must adhere to GDPR, UK GDPR, Swiss FADP, or other relevant European data protection frameworks.
  • European Headquarters: The company or project must be based in Europe.
  • Technology Focus Must be a company or project that leverages technology as a core component of its operations, products, or services.

Index / CDN

  • CDN77 🇨🇿 Content delivery network based in the Czech Republic.

Index / Communication Tools

  • Alugha 🇩🇪 - Multilingual video hosting platform.
  • Ginlo 🇩🇪 -Secure messaging app.
  • Mastodon 🇩🇪 - Open-source decentralized social network.
  • Olvid 🇫🇷 - Privacy-first messaging with zero metadata.
  • Pleroma 🇩🇪 - Open-source social networking software.
  • Sproof 🇩🇪 - Digital signature and document management service.
  • Stackfield 🇩🇪 - Cloud storage and collaboration service.
  • TeamViewer 🇩🇪 - Remote access and support software company.
  • TeleGuard 🇨🇭 - Encrypted messaging and calls.
  • Threema 🇨🇭 - End-to-end encrypted messaging for privacy.

Index / Cybersecurity

  • Bitdefender 🇷🇴 - Cybersecurity and antivirus software company.

Index / Database Management Systems

  • DuckDB 🇳🇱 - An in-process SQL OLAP database management system.

Index / Design and Creative Tools

  • Blender Foundation 🇳🇱 - Open-source 3D creation suite for modeling, animation, and more.
  • Photopea 🇨🇿 - online photo editor.

Index / DNS

  • Hostinger 🇱🇹

Index / E-commerce Platforms

  • Omnisend 🇱🇹 - An e-commerce marketing automation platform.
  • Shoperb 🇵🇱 - e-commerce platform.
  • Vinted 🇱🇹 - An online marketplace for second-hand fashion.
  • Wolt 🇫🇮 - Food delivery service. (Now owned by US-based DoorDash.)

Index / FinTech

  • FintechOS 🇷🇴 - Company providing digital transformation for financial institutions.
  • Smartbill 🇷🇴 - Fintech company offering billing solutions.
  • Starling Bank 🇬🇧 - Digital challenger bank.

Index / Hardware

  • ASML 🇳🇱 - Company specializing in photolithography systems for the semiconductor industry.
  • Axelera 🇳🇱 - AI acceleration hardware for edge computing.
  • Raspberry Pi 🇬🇧 - Affordable single-board computers for DIY projects.
  • Recogni 🇩🇪 - Company focusing on AI-powered vision processing for autonomous systems.
  • Sipearl 🇫🇷 - Company developing microprocessors for high-performance computing (HPC), particularly for the European Processor Initiative (EPI).

Index / Marketing Tools

  • Keila 🇩🇪 - Open Source email newsletter tool.

Index / Quantum Computing

  • QBLOX 🇳🇱 - Qubit agnostic control electronics.
  • Orange Quantum Systems 🇳🇱 - Solutions testing and integration.
  • QuantWare 🇳🇱 - Design and manufacture of superconducting hardware.

Index / Sustainability and Recycling

  • Dembrane 🇩🇰 - Company specializing in sustainable membrane technology.

Index / Translation services

  • Unbabel 🇵🇹
  • Widn.ai 🇵🇹

Index / VPS

  • Webdock 🇩🇰

Index / Cloud

  • Aruba 🇮🇹 - Cloud hosting and data center services.
  • Cozy 🇫🇷 - Privacy-first personal cloud for data management.
  • datacrunch 🇫🇮 - GPU cloud computing for AI/ML workloads.
  • Elastx 🇸🇪 - Managed cloud hosting with a focus on sustainability.
  • Exoscale 🇨🇭 - Scalable cloud infrastructure for developers.
  • Filen 🇩🇪 - End-to-end encrypted cloud storage.
  • Fuga Cloud 🇳🇱 - OpenStack-based public cloud platform.
  • gridscale 🇩🇪 - Flexible IaaS and PaaS solutions.
  • Infomaniak kDrive 🇨🇭 - Cloud storage with collaboration tools.

  • IONOS 🇩🇪 - Comprehensive cloud and web hosting services.

  • OVHcloud 🇫🇷 - Global cloud provider with bare-metal servers.
  • pCloud 🇨🇭 - Lifetime encrypted cloud storage plans.
  • Seeweb 🇮🇹 - High-performance Italian cloud hosting.
  • STACKIT 🇩🇪 - Cloud platform for businesses.
  • Tresorit 🇨🇭 - End-to-end encrypted file sharing for enterprises.

Index / Communication Tools

  • Element (Matrix) 🇬🇧 - Secure messaging via the Matrix protocol.
  • Jitsi 🇫🇷 - Open-source video conferencing and chat.
  • Wire 🇨🇭 - Secure enterprise communication platform.

  • inwx 🇩🇪

  • netim 🇫🇷

Index / FinTech

  • Klarna 🇸🇪 - Buy now, pay later shopping solutions.
  • N26 🇩🇪 - Mobile-first banking with no hidden fees.

  • Mailbox.org 🇩🇪 - Secure email with ad-free productivity suites.
  • Mailfence 🇧🇪 - Encrypted email and document collaboration.
  • Posteo 🇩🇪 - Eco-friendly email with strong privacy.
  • ProtonMail 🇨🇭 - Secure email with end-to-end encryption.

  • heylogin 🇩🇪

  • Padloc 🇩🇪
  • Passbolt 🇫🇷
  • pCloud Pass 🇨🇭

Index / Productivity Tools

  • CryptPad 🇫🇷 - End-to-end encrypted collaboration suite.
  • Formbricks 🇩🇪 - Open-source survey and feedback tool.
  • Joplin 🇫🇷 - Note-taking app with sync and encryption.
  • LibreOffice 🇩🇪 - Free and open-source office suite.

Index / Search engine

  • Ecosia 🇩🇪 - Carbon-neutral search engine planting trees.
  • Qwant 🇫🇷 - Privacy-respecting search engine from France.
  • Startpage 🇳🇱 - Private search with Google results.

Index / Translation services

  • DeepL 🇩🇪 - AI-powered translation with high accuracy.
  • ModernMT 🇮🇹 - Adaptive machine translation for enterprises.
  • Reverso 🇫🇷 - Context-aware translation and language tools.

Index / VPS

Index / VPN

  • AirVPN 🇮🇹 - Privacy-focused VPN with open-source ethos.
  • F‑Secure FREEDOME VPN 🇫🇮 - VPN with malware blocking.
  • Mullvad VPN 🇸🇪 - No-logs VPN with anonymous accounts.
  • OctoVPN 🇩🇰 - High-performance gaming VPN with DDoS protection.
  • Xeovo 🇫🇮 - Privacy-focused VPN with anonymous payments.

Index / Web Analytics

  • Alceris 🇫🇷 - AI-driven analytics for web performance and SEO.
  • Analyzati 🇪🇸 - Privacy-friendly web analytics for businesses.
  • Dreamdata 🇩🇰 - B2B revenue attribution and data platform.
  • fusedeck 🇨🇭 - Swiss real-time tracking and analytics.
  • Matomo by Stackhero 🇫🇷 - Managed Matomo analytics hosting.
  • Mouseflow 🇩🇰 - Session replay and heatmaps for UX analysis.
  • Offen 🇩🇪 - Self-hosted web analytics with user-first privacy.
  • Pirsch 🇩🇪 - Simple, cookie-free, and GDPR-compliant analytics.
  • SEAL Metrics 🇪🇸 - Cookieless web analytics for GDPR compliance.
  • Stormly 🇳🇱 - AI-powered business intelligence platform.
  • Swetrix 🇺🇦 - Lightweight analytics with real-time tracking.
  • TelemetryDeck 🇩🇪 - Privacy-first telemetry for apps.
  • Visitor Analytics 🇷🇴 - Website analytics and behavior tracking.

entry.title: Awesome European Tech Updates on Jan 25, 2025
entry.content:
Overview

  • GDPR Compliance: European companies are required to comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), which ensures stricter data privacy and security for users compared to many other regions, including the U.S. This regulation has become a global gold standard for data protection.
  • Sustainability Standards: Many European companies prioritize eco-friendly practices, such as utilizing renewable energy, reducing carbon emissions, and adopting circular economy principles. These efforts align with the EU’s ambitious Green Deal initiatives, making them leaders in sustainable innovation.
